name: Pinus 64x
description:
Pinus 64x is a first person shooter made for the LOWREZJAM

Instructions:

W/S walk forward/backward, A/D turn left/right, Space to shoot, R to reload, numbers 1-3 to change guns as you unlock them, The red bar at the bottom of your screen is your health and the green bar is your magazine, Reach the black tunnel at the end of each level to progress to the next level

Lore:

You are a space paratrooper sent to capture the planet Pinus, the single most earth-like planet in the galaxy other than earth. The landing scattered you and your allies across the planet and you must fight your way against the local aliens to reunite with them
